---
title: '关键查询'
---

* 主数据的属性, 关联着其他表中的数据, 具体内容需要再次查询
![关联查询](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/006y8mN6ly1g8kuwu3shbj310w08cmxh.jpg)

* 定义数据结构
```js
const {Schema, model} = require('mongoose')

// 教师
const STeacher = Schema({
  name: {type: String, required: true},
  age: {type: Number, default: 0},
  grade: {type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, ref: 'grade'}  // 关联班级
})
// 学生
const SStudent = Schema({
  name: {type: String, required: true},
  age: {type: Number, default: 0},
  grade: {type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, ref: 'grade'}  // 关联班级
})
// 班级
const SGrade = Schema({
  scend: {type: String, required: true},
  teachers: {type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, ref: 'teachers'},  // 关联教师
  students: [{type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, ref: 'students'}]  // 关联学生
})

module.exports = {
  MTeacher: model('teachers', STeacher),
  MStudent: model('students', SStudent),
  MGrade: model('grades', SGrade)
}
```

* 创建, 关联, 查询
```js
const {MGrade, MTeacher, MStudent } = require('./m-school')
const sleep = (time=0) => new Promise((resolve, reject) => setTimeout(resolve,time))

// 创建 班级/教师/学生
let PGrade1 = new MGrade({
  scend: '三年级1班'
}).save()
let PTeacher1 = new MTeacher({
  name: '王老师',
  age: 55,
}).save()
let PStudent1 = new MStudent({
  name: '张三',
  age: 28,
}).save()


Promise.all([PGrade1, PTeacher1, PStudent1]).then(async ([grade1, teacher1, student1]) => {
  // 关联 教师/学生/班级 的信息, 并保存
  student1.grade = grade1
  await student1.save()
  teacher1.grade = grade1
  await teacher1.save();

  grade1.teachers = teacher1
  grade1.students.push(student1)
  await grade1.save();
  
  return sleep(100)
}).then(student1 => {
  // 在班级角度查询
  // 查询条件1: 需要填充得字段
  // 查询条件2: 需要查询的字段, -_id => 不返回_id
  MGrade.findOne({scend: '三年级1班'}, {_id: 0}).populate('teachers students', 'scend name -_id').then(grade1 => {
    console.log('>>> 班级:', grade1);
  })

  // 在学生角度查询
  MStudent.findOne({age: 28}).populate('grade').then(student1 => {
    console.log('>>> 学生:', student1);
  })
})
```

* 关联查询结果
